medkit.name: Medkit
medkit.description: Standard Zone medical kit. Contains bandages, painkillers, and anti-radiation drugs.

vodka.name: Vodka
vodka.description: Cheap but effective. Helps with radiation but impairs coordination.

bread.name: Stale Bread
bread.description: Basic sustenance. Doesn't taste great but keeps hunger at bay.

detector.name: Echo Detector
detector.description: Basic anomaly and artifact detector. Beeps when near anomalous activity.
